knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r, include=FALSE}
knit_print.data.frame = function(x, ...) {
  res = paste(c("", "", knitr::kable(x)), collapse = "\n")
  knitr::asis_output(res)
}

registerS3method(
  "knit_print", "data.frame", knit_print.data.frame,
  envir = asNamespace("knitr")
)
```
